extension.name: iPhAppUser
extension.author: Thorben Hartmann
extension.description: This template is used for the site, that's shown when you are logged in. It's got a header, a sidebar at the left, a footer and a large space for the content. The Sidebar will be disabled when you are use a mobile-phone. You can pop it out when you click on the shown Button

field.name: buttonValue
field.label: Value of the Sidebar Button
field.description: Value of the Button witch is shown on mobile phone

field.name: logoFile
field.label: Site Logo
field.description: Pick a site logo from the media library
